text:
="preserve">Cyril Colbeau-Justin (28 September 1970 – 7 November 2020) was a French movie producer. He was born in Paris. His career began in 2000. His best known movies produced were "A Gang Story" (2011), "Hollywoo" (2011), "Mea Culpa" (2014), "Rabin, the Last Day" (2015) "Down by Love" (2016) and "Madame" (2017).
Colbeau-Justin died of cancer in Paris on 7 November 2020 at the age of 50.
